definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质反应与烧伤的严重性是平行的。

sentences.english: The effect ol' Liu Shen Wan (LSW) on the ultrastructure and function of the zonafasciculata of adrenal cortex was observed in this study.
sentences.chinese: 观察了六神丸对肾上腺皮质束状带形态与功能的作用。

sentences.english: Adrenal cortical hormone is effective in the treatment of HNL.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质激素在治疗HNL方面疗效满意。

sentences.english: Clinical analysis of 70 cases with chronic adrenocortical hypofunction.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肾上腺皮质功能减退症70例临床分析。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 4 cases of coexisting primary aldosteronism and pheochromocytoma were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析4例肾上腺皮髓质混合性病变资料。

sentences.english: Zergling adrenal gland upgrade effects corrected.
sentences.chinese: 小狗肾上腺素的升级效果被修正了。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of adrenal medullary hyperplasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高肾上腺髓质增生症的诊断水平和治疗效果。

sentences.english: In men, androgens are produced primarily by the testes and the adrenal glands.
sentences.chinese: 男人雄激素主要由睾丸和肾上腺产生。

sentences.english: Hewas rushed to the hospital and injected with Adrenalin.
sentences.chinese: 他被急忙送往医院注射肾上腺素。

sentences.english: Just when hormones are needed, the adrenals start to make them.
sentences.chinese: 当需要荷尔蒙时，肾上腺就开始分泌。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of adrenal pheochromocytoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高肾上腺嗜铬细胞瘤的诊断与治疗水平。

sentences.english: The adrenaline will keep you awake.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素会让你保持清醒状态哦。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of norepinephrine on cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察去甲肾上腺素处理对心肺复苏的影响。

sentences.english: The adrenal gland dumps cortisol and adrenaline into the blood stream.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺分泌大量的皮质醇和肾上腺素进入血液。

sentences.english: The adrenal gland dumps cortisol and adrenaline into the blood stream.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺分泌大量的皮质醇和肾上腺素进入血液。

sentences.english: They believe it is associated with the closely related neurotransmitter norepinephrine.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信这与正肾上腺素和神经传递素密切相关。

definition: pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
